dc_description_s: This datalayer contains city ward boundaries linked to Census demographics for Kolkata, India, 2001. Includes city ward socio-demographic and economic Census attribute data such as total population, population by sex, rural/urban populations, household, literacy, and employment statistics.  This layer is part of the Wards of Indian Cities dataset series which includes socio-demographic and economic Census data for 2001 for selected Indian cities at the City Ward level.
